paywall.title: What happens after the Free Scan?

items.q: Is it safe? Do you store my files?
items.a: Absolutely. We do not store your documents. The bot analyzes text in real-time and forgets it immediately after the report.

items.q: Is it better than a lawyer?
items.a: It's faster and cheaper. Use a lawyer for court. Use Rentgen *before* signing to simply know: 'Am I being scammed?'
Fast Scan is free. You will see red risk flags. The full report with detailed loss calculations costs a small fee.
